select a.category_id as categoryId, c.name as name, count(category_id) as num from lzh_article a left join lzh_category c on a.category_id = c.id where a.del_flag = 0 and a.status = 0 and c.del_flag = 0 and c.status = 0 and c.status = 0 group by category_id
